game.name: Master Of Pottery
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Master of Pottery is a pottery-themed creation + simulation game. Make pottery, open exhibitions, complete orders, train apprentices, run your own showroom and start a relaxing pottery journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Master of Pottery is a pottery-themed creation + simulation game. Make pottery, open exhibitions, complete orders, train apprentices, run your own showroom and start a relaxing pottery journey.
